alert.note: Alert for Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Trinity; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 2:14PM PST until December 29 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 2000 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. * WHERE...Northern Humboldt Interior, Southern Humboldt Interior, Northern Trinity and Southern Trinity Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Trinity; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity
